snippet.title: Mineral Madness - Trailer
snippet.description:
🎊 WISHLIST ON STEAM 🎊
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2204560/Mineral_Madness/

Mineral Madness is a multiplayer first-person game, taking place in a fully destructible and procedurally generated cave system. Players will navigate inside a foggy cave, filled with minerals, mushrooms, bugs and flora. The player's purpose is mainly to collect minerals but they will also have to deal with each other and maybe even bugs to complete the task. Each player will use their tools to excavate, attack and navigate in pursuit to be the leading mole!

Follow us on social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StudioWhacky
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/whackymolestudio/
Discord: https://discord.gg/auJrCMz8
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/MineralMadness/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Whacky-Mole-Studio-104668518858179
